name: Phone Bug
description:
You are a computer virus seeking to infect everyone who is connected to the wifi of a very popular cafe. Hop from device to device to infect as many people as possible. 

Select the person you want to hop to, and hit “done.” When jumping, pay careful attention to your energy levels and use your mouse to stay inside the green bar otherwise your health will be depleted. If you fail a jump, you will be sent back to the person you jumped off of. Good luck!
